detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string,uint8).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#151) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#158-160) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string,uint8).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#151) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#162-164) (function)

ERC20.constructor(string,string,uint8).decimals (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#151) shadows:
	- ERC20.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#166-168) (function)

Address.isContract(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#77-83) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#81)

ERC20.onlyMinter() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#146-149) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool)(_minters[msg.sender] == true) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#147)
Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#1) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
detectors.markdown: Pragma version[^0.6.12](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#L1) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11

detectors.description: solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.6.12 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:
Low level call in SafeERC20._callOptionalReturn(IERC20,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#109-120):
	- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#113)
Variable ERC20._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#131) is not in mixedCase
Variable ERC20._governor (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#138) is not in mixedCase
Variable ERC20._minters (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#139) is not in mixedCase

FLR.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#286-291) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 1000000 * 1000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#289)
detectors.markdown:
[FLR.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#L286-L291) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 1000000 * 1000000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FLR.sol#L289)
